metadata.title: CVE-2023-32200 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: There is insufficient restrictions of called script functions in ApacheJena versions 4.8.0 and earlier. It allows a remote user to executejavascript via a SPARQL query. This issue affects Apache Jena: from 3.7.0through 4.8.0.

criterions.comment: apache-jena package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
